BR_text.BRsummary: invalid use of a potential null pointer
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OpenCV => git master branch
 Operating System / Platform => ubuntu 18.04
 Compiler => gcc-7
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
 
 In line 231 from opencv/modules/core/src/matrix_sparse.cpp,the hdr pointer may be null when  dereferenced,as follows:
 
 
 if (_sizes == hdr->size)
 
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 See the code.
